description: The best delicious Mary's Sugar Cookies recipe with easy-to-follow step-by-step instructions that are straightforward and foolproof.
instructions: Cream butter & sugar. Mix in egg & flavorings. Mix dry ingredients & blend into above mixture, dough will be stiff. Can refrigerate a few min. or can make into balls & place on a cookie sheet about 1 1/2 to 2 inches apart. Press down with a fork. Place pecan on each cookie (optional) & bake at 375 degrees until brown.
